languages.text: "Я благодарна Неумирающему за возможность убить этого нелюдя многократно... Поэтичное возмездие за то, что он сделал со мной".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Ulfar: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

languages.text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."
languages.original_text: "Я благодарна Неумирающему за возможность убить этого нелюдя многократно... Поэтичное возмездие за то, что он сделал со мной".

traits.locale_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this inhuman many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."
"I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this inhuman many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."
"I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this inhuman many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."
"I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."
"I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

languages.text: "Ich bin dem Todlosen dankbar für die Gelegenheit, diesen Xenos viele Male töten zu dürfen ... Poetische Gerechtigkeit für das, was er mir angetan hat."
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin dem Todlosen dankbar für die Gelegenheit, diesen Xenos viele Male töten zu dürfen ... Poetische Gerechtigkeit für das, was er mir angetan hat."

languages.text: « Je rends grâce à l'Immortel pour cette occasion qui m'est donnée de tuer ce xénos à de multiples reprises... Après ce qu'il m'a fait subir, j'y vois une manière toute poétique de rendre justice. »
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je rends grâce à l'Immortel pour cette occasion qui m'est donnée de tuer ce xénos à de multiples reprises... Après ce qu'il m'a fait subir, j'y vois une manière toute poétique de rendre justice. »

languages.text: «Agradezco al Inmortal la oportunidad de matar repetidamente a este xenos... Es justicia poética por lo que me hizo él».
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco al Inmortal la oportunidad de matar repetidamente a este xenos... Es justicia poética por lo que me hizo él».

languages.text: 「異種族を何度も殺すチャンスをくれたことを、不死の者には感謝している。彼が私にしてくれたことを考えると、これは正義よ」
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族を何度も殺すチャンスをくれたことを、不死の者には感謝している。彼が私にしてくれたことを考えると、これは正義よ」

languages.text: “我很高兴，不死之神赐予了我一次又一次杀死这个异形的机会……他对我所做的一切，都得到了应有的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴，不死之神赐予了我一次又一次杀死这个异形的机会……他对我所做的一切，都得到了应有的惩罚。”

languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."

languages.text: "Bana bu zenoyu öldürme fırsatını bahşettiği için Ölmeyen'e defalarca şükranlarımı sunuyorum. Bana yaptıkları karşılığında ilahi adaleti hak etti."
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to the Undying One for the opportunity to kill this xenos many times over... Poetic justice for what he did to me."
